Mark Ford provides the highest quality service possible as a faculty member of Colorado Technical University.  I was blown away by the ingenuity he displays consistently with his teaching style.  He has every second of the class planned and is able to manage the classroom effortlessly.  I have personally witnessed him teach two sections of the same class at the same time without ignoring a single student's comments or needs.  He can take a difficult topic to master and make it easy to learn and fun for everyone.  It is clearly evident that he enjoys teaching and has mastered all aspects of his field.

summary: Highly educated in Software Engineering & Development, positioned to contribute to best-practice application design and development. Related experience, education, and practicum include:•	Software Programming: Technically sophisticated in application development, adept at utilizing leading technologies and design methodologies. Proven success applying innovative problem solving to translate requirements into cost-effective solutions and successfully deliver high-quality products.•	Projects: Develop innovative approaches to solution development, applying complementary project management, business analysis, and development strategies to achieve goals. Equally adept at project team coordination and collaboration, demonstrating teambuilding and leadership talents.•	User Support: Skilled in troubleshooting, diagnosing, and correcting technology bugs and defects. Top-notch service, communication, and issue-resolution skills for development and production systems, with a focus on ensuring availability. Finely honed analytical and interpersonal relations skills.•	Key Strengths: Highly autonomous with exceptional critical-thinking and decision-making skills. Capable and dedicated professional with versatility enabling rapid adaptation to new teams, environments, and procedures; creative and flexible with an enjoyment for taking on challenges.Specialties: Design and development of applications and improving existing technologies.
